info.title: AODocs REST API
info.description: The AODocs REST API exposes most of the features of AODocs. It can be used to implement custom applications, third-party integration, bulk tools, or just to experiment with AODocs.

tags.name: documentType
tags.description: Lets you manipulate existing document classes (beta version, subject to change)

get.description: Gets the configuration of a document class.

parameters.name: documentTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include additional information in the document class. Available value: TEMPLATES

put.description: Updates a document class configuration (reset not specified fields).

parameters.name: documentTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

parameters.name: resetInvalidTemplateValues
parameters.description: Whether to reset the values of invalid properties in document templates of the class

parameters.name: documentTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

patch.description: Updates a document class configuration (keep existing values for not specified fields).

parameters.name: documentTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

parameters.name: resetInvalidTemplateValues
parameters.description: Whether to reset the values of invalid properties in document templates of the class

get.description: Lists the ID/name of the document classes in a library.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include additional information in the document class. Available value: TEMPLATES

post.description: Creates a new document class in the library.

get.description: Lists the full content of the document templates of the given class in the library.

parameters.name: documentTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

put.description: Creates a new document template of a class in the library.

parameters.name: documentTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

get.description: Gets the configuration of a document template.

parameters.name: documentTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

parameters.name: templateDocumentId
parameters.description: The ID of the document template

parameters.name: documentTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

parameters.name: templateDocumentId
parameters.description: The ID of the document template

parameters.name: documentTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the document class

parameters.name: templateDocumentId
parameters.description: The ID of the document template

stringValue.description: The value of the tag as a String

fileId.description: The ID the file in Drive

iconLink.description: The URL of the icon of the file

link.description: The URL to the file in Drive (read-only)

mimeType.description: The MIME type of the file

permissionsOnDrive.description: The list of permissions set in Drive for the file

publishedLink.description: The URL of the file when published

resourceKey.description: A file that is shared with the link may only be discovered with this resourceKey

revisionId.description: The ID of the revision of the file in Drive

size.description: The size (in octet) of the file

storageLocation.description: The storage location of the file. Possible values are 'DRIVE' and 'OSS' (read-only)

enabled.description: Whether this attachment creation mode should be possible for this document class

mustBeEnabled.description: Whether this attachment creation mode must be enabled or can be disabled according to library type and settings (read-only)

id.description: The ID the file as used on the storage type

mimeType.description: The MIME type of the file

size.description: The size (in octet) of the file

storageType.description: Where is the file stored? Either DRIVE (Google Drive), or OSS (AODocs Object Storage System)

name.description: The displayed name of the user

nonGoogle.description: This user is not a google user

thumbnailPictureUrl.description: The URL of the thumbnail picture of the user

code.description: JavaScript expression in charge of generating the actual value of the setting (ECMAScript 2020)

fallbackValues.description: Fallback value(s) used when there was evaluation error on the calculated setting

error.description: Indicates whether the evaluation of the setting terminated on error (read-only)

errorMessage.description: If the evaluation terminated on error, indicates the error message (read-only)

code.description: JavaScript expression in charge of generating document field values (ECMAScript 2020)

calculatedSettingsInfo.description: Information about the result of evaluation of calculated settings (read-only)

description_i18n.description: The internationalized description of the field (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

fieldName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the field (read-only)

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the user user

multiple.description: Whether there can be multiple values

placeholderText.description: The help text to display in the field input (read-only)

rank.description: The rank at which the field is displayed in the document page (read-only)

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

type.description: The field type (STRING, DATE, ..., CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG)

dynamicValues.description: Whether the category authorizes dynamic values

folder.description: Whether the category is the Folder category (read-only)

levelNames.description: The name of the levels in the category

levelNames_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the levels in the category (read-only field)

tags.description: Whether the category is the Tags category (read-only)

value.description: The ID of the category (backward compatibility for category.category.listCategoryDefinitions)

ancestors.description: Ancestor category values from direct parent to root - only present with loadCategoryValue

id.description: The ID of the category value

leaf.description: Whether the category value is leaf

leafInNotOutdatedTree.description: Whether the category value is leaf without not outdated child

name.description: The name of the category value

name_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the category value (read-only field)

outdated.description: Whether the category value is marked as outdated

parentId.description: The ID of the parent category value (read-only field)

shortName.description: The short name of the category value

value.description: (Deprecated) The ID of the category value

appMetadata.description: App Metadata let developers associate metadata with various configuration entities. The metadata is isolated within app namespaces in order to prevent one application from interfering with another's metadata.

categoryId.description: The ID of the category (if type = CATEGORY) - (deprecated, read-only)

columns.description: The column properties of the field (only if this field is a table type field)

customPlaceholder.description: Whether to use a custom placeholder when displaying the field in the UI

hidden.description: Whether the field should be hidden for the whole life-cycle of documents of the class

id.description: The ID of the field (read-only field)

mandatory.description: Whether the field should be mandatory for the whole life-cycle of documents of the class (not compatible for all field types)

multiple.description: Whether the field should be multi-valued (not compatible for all field types)

placeholderText.description: The placeholder text if customPlaceholder = true

rank.description: The rank of the field in the list (deprecated)

readOnly.description: Whether the field should be read-only for the whole life-cycle of documents of the class (not compatible for all field types)

referenceCatalogId.description: The ID of the reference catalog (if type = REFERENCE_CATALOG)

type.description: The type of field (STRING, TEXT, DATE, TIME, DATETIME, INTEGER, DECIMAL, BOOLEAN, PERSON, GEOPOINT, URL, CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG, TABLE)

readOnly.description: Whether the system field should be read-only for the whole life-cycle of documents of the class

appMetadata.description: App Metadata let developers associate metadata with various configuration entities. The metadata is isolated within app namespaces in order to prevent one application from interfering with another's metadata.

categoryId.description: The ID of the category (if type = CATEGORY) - (deprecated, read-only)

columns.description: The column properties of the field (only if this field is a table type field)

customPlaceholder.description: Whether to use a custom placeholder when displaying the field in the UI

hidden.description: Whether the field should be hidden for the whole life-cycle of documents of the class

id.description: The ID of the field (read-only field)

mandatory.description: Whether the field should be mandatory for the whole life-cycle of documents of the class (not compatible for all field types)

multiple.description: Whether the field should be multi-valued (not compatible for all field types)

placeholderText.description: The placeholder text if customPlaceholder = true

rank.description: The rank of the field in the list (deprecated)

readOnly.description: Whether the field should be read-only for the whole life-cycle of documents of the class (not compatible for all field types)

referenceCatalogId.description: The ID of the reference catalog (if type = REFERENCE_CATALOG)

type.description: The type of field (STRING, TEXT, DATE, TIME, DATETIME, INTEGER, DECIMAL, BOOLEAN, PERSON, GEOPOINT, URL, CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG, TABLE)

event.description: The type of event (in workflow transitions: ON_STATE_ENTER_BEFORE_TRANSITION, ON_ENTER_STATE_AFTER_TRANSITION, ON_LEAVE_STATE_BEFORE_TRANSITION or ON_STATE_LEAVE_AFTER_TRANSITION, in relations: ON_RELATION_FILTER or ON_RELATION_RENDER, in classes: ON_DOCUMENT_UPDATE or ON_DOCUMENT_DISPLAY)

params.description: The map key/value of the parameters

scriptId.description: The ID of the custom script

scriptName.description: The name of the custom script (read-only field)

hidden.description: Whether the field should be hidden during document creation only

mandatory.description: Whether the field should be mandatory during document creation only (not compatible for all field types)

readOnly.description: Whether the field should be read-only during document creation only (not compatible for all field types)

appMetadata.description: App Metadata let developers associate metadata with various configuration entities. The metadata is isolated within app namespaces in order to prevent one application from interfering with another's metadata.

attachmentCreationModes.description: The list of supported attachment create modes with there setting (at least one mode should be enabled)

checkoutMode.description: The mode for check-out use (DISABLED: no check-out possible, OPTIONAL: check-out can be used, MANDATORY: check-out must be used)

coordinate.description: The coordinate of the document class based on the sequence ID (read-only field)

creators.description: The list of users/groups/roles who can create documents of this class (administrators implicitly can and readers implicitly can't)

customActions.description: This list of custom actions to be triggered on documents of this class (both viewer and update actions)

defaultClass.description: Whether this class is the default document class of the library (read-only field)

defaultTemplateId.description: The ID of the default document template of the document class

deleteFields.description: The list of field IDs to delete from the document class (use only during patch)

description.description: The description of the document class

displayName.description: The name of the document class

displayName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the document class (read-only field)

documentCopyDisabled.description: Whether document copying is allowed or not

elementsToCopy.description: User settings determining which attributes to copy when using 'Create From' mode to create a new document.

explicitPermissionMode.description: The mode for permissions override: EXPLICIT_PERMISSIONS_ALLOWED or EXPLICIT_PERMISSIONS_DISABLED

fields.description: The list of fields (metadata) configured in the document class

firstVersionName.description: The name of the first version if firstVersionNumberingMode = FIXED

firstVersionNumberingMode.description: Whether the first version's name should be overridden (FIXED) or implicit (AUTOMATIC)

forceNumberVersions.description: Whether the version names must be numerical values

id.description: The ID of the document class (read-only field)

libraryId.description: The ID of the library in which the document class is (read-only field)

managedPermissionSource.description: The inheritance mode for permissions: CLASS, WORKFLOW, FOLDER

manualVersioningDisabled.description: Whether the manual versioning should be disabled for documents of this class

name.description: The display name of the document class (backward compatibility for documentType.documentType.listClasses)

name_i18n.description: The localized display name of the document class (backward compatibility for documentType.documentType.listClasses)

onlyAdminsCanDelete.description: Whether only library administrators can delete documents of the class

onlyAdminsCanShare.description: Whether only library administrators can share documents of the class

permissions.description: The list of users/groups/roles who can access the documents of this class (if managedPermissionSource = CLASS) and their access level

readOnlyTitle.description: DEPRECATED. Use systemFields['_title'].readOnly instead. Whether the title field should be read-only for whole life-cycle of documents of this class (except creation)

restrictedDownload.description: Whether the documents of this class should be restricted for download by readers

sections.description: The sections of fields for organization

sectionsDefaultColumnCount.description: Default column count to apply to sections without a specific columnCount. Defaults to 2

sequenceId.description: The ID of sequence of the document class (read-only field)

systemFields.description: The list of system fields in the document class (contains only '_title' for now)

templates.description: The document templates of this class (read-only, returned only if TEMPLATES is specified within the include request param)

usersCanAccessPreviousVersions.description: Whether users can access the previous versions of the documents of this class

value.description: The ID of the document class (backward compatibility for documentType.documentType.listClasses)

workflowId.description: The ID of the workflow in which the document class is (read-only field)

defaultTabToDisplay.description: The tab to display when open the document

orientation.description: The orientation to display the document (PORTRAIT or LANDSCAPE)

visibleRelations.description: The list of ordered relations to display in the Relations section

visibleSections.description: The list of ordered sections to display

iconLink.description: The URL of the icon of the file

link.description: The URL to the file in Drive

permissionsOnDrive.description: The list of permissions set in Drive for the file

publishedLink.description: The URL of the file when published

resourceKey.description: A file that is shared with the link may only be discovered with this resourceKey

revisionId.description: The ID of the revision of the file in Drive

additionalRoles.description: The additional roles for the permission like COMMENTER

allowlisted.description: Whether the email address is allowlisted (individually or via its domain) in the current domain

belongsToDomain.description: Whether the email address is part of the current domain

email.description: The email of the permission or the domain name if type = DOMAIN

googleEmailAddress.description: Whether the email address is tied to a Google account

name.description: The displayed name for the permission

permissionId.description: The unique ID for the permission in Drive

role.description: The role of the permission: READER, WRITER, OWNER

thumbnailPhotoUrl.description: The URL of the thumbnail picture of the permitted user or group

type.description: The type of permission in Drive: ANYONE, DOMAIN, GROUP, USER

withLink.description: Whether the permission imposes to have the link to access (vs. can be searched for)

calculatedSettingsInfo.description: Information about the result of evaluation of calculated settings (read-only)

description_i18n.description: The internationalized description of the field (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

fieldName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the field (read-only)

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the user user

multiple.description: Whether there can be multiple values

placeholderText.description: The help text to display in the field input (read-only)

rank.description: The rank at which the field is displayed in the document page (read-only)

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

type.description: The field type (STRING, DATE, ..., CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG)

values.description: The list of values for the field

type.description: The type of the field (read-only field)

columnCount.description: The number of columns to display fields for this section.

fields.description: The list of fields in the section

id.description: The ID of the section (read-only field)

name_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the section (read-only field)

errorMessage.description: The error message if the value inputted is not valid

lowerLimit.description: The lower limit of the range for numerical fields

lowerLimitInclusive.description: Whether to include the lower limit value in the range

mandatoryLeaf.description: Whether the leaf selection is required for Category or Reference Catalog fields

regex.description: The regular expression for String fields

upperLimit.description: The upper limit of the range for numerical fields

upperLimitInclusive.description: Whether to include the upper limit value in the range

error.description: If the field has no value, indicates whether this is due to an evaluation error (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the folder is editable by the current user (read-only field)

editableDocuments.description: Whether the documents in the folder are editable by the current user (read-only field)

fileId.description: The ID of the folder in Drive

folderAodocsId.description: The ID of the folder in AODocs model (0 if root folder)

folderDefinitionId.description: (Deprecated) The ID of the folder configuration

folderIsRoot.description: Whether the folder is the root folder (read-only field)

parentFolderAodocsId.description: The ID of the parent folder in AODocs model (0 if root folder)

parentFolderDriveId.description: The ID of the parent folder in Drive

parentFolderIsRoot.description: Whether the parent folder is the root folder (read-only field)

permittedOperations.description: The list of permitted operations to the current user (read-only field)

resourceKey.description: A folder that is shared with the link may only be discovered with this resourceKey

restrictedDownload.description: Whether the documents in the folder are marked as restricted to download, copy and print (for the readers)

appNamespaceId.description: The id of the app namespace (read-only)

tags.description: The list of tags (name/value) in the namespace (limited to 10 items)

downloadLink.description: The URL to download the OSS file

displayName.description: The displayed name if type = USER, GROUP or ROLE

role.description: The level of the permission (READER, COMMENTER, WRITER or ATTACHMENT_EDITOR)

thumbnailPictureUrl.description: The URL of the thumbnail picture (for users)

type.description: The type of permitted audience (ANYONE, DOMAIN, GROUP, USER or ROLE)

value.description: The email address if type = USER or GROUP, the ID of the role if type = ROLE

withLink.description: Whether the audience will have access with the link

createdAt.description: The timestamp (in ms) at which the catalog was created (read-only field)

id.description: The ID of the reference catalog (read-only field)

levelNames.description: Ordered name of levels of the reference catalog

modifiedAt.description: The timestamp (in ms) at which the catalog was last modified (read-only field)

name.description: The name of the reference catalog

numberOfValues.description: The number of values in the reference catalog (read-only field)

calculatedSettingsInfo.description: Information about the result of evaluation of calculated settings (read-only)

description_i18n.description: The internationalized description of the field (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

fieldName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the field (read-only)

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the user user

multiple.description: Whether there can be multiple values

placeholderText.description: The help text to display in the field input (read-only)

rank.description: The rank at which the field is displayed in the document page (read-only)

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

referenceCatalogId.description: The ID of the reference catalog

type.description: The field type (STRING, DATE, ..., CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG)

values.description: The list of reference catalog values

classId.description: The ID of the class when type = FIELD

className.description: The name of the class when type = FIELD

description.description: The description for type in GROUP, ROLE, FIELD

displayName.description: The display name of the user or group, the name of the role (read-only field)

displayName_i18n.description: The display name of the user or group, the internationalized name of the role (read-only field)

thumbnailPictureUrl.description: The URL of the thumbnail picture (especially for users)

type.description: The type of person (user, group, role, field based, domain i.e. everybody)

value.description: The email address if user or group, the ID of the role, the ID of the class/field (ignored if type = DOMAIN)

displayName.description: The internationalized name of the field

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the current user

id.description: The ID of the system field

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

calculatedSettingsInfo.description: Information about the result of evaluation of calculated settings (read-only)

description_i18n.description: The internationalized description of the field (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

fieldName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the field (read-only)

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the user user

multiple.description: Whether there can be multiple values

placeholderText.description: The help text to display in the field input (read-only)

rank.description: The rank at which the field is displayed in the document page (read-only)

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

type.description: The field type (STRING, DATE, ..., CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG)

calculatedSettingsInfo.description: Information about the result of evaluation of calculated settings (read-only)

columns.description: The columns definition of the table (read-only)

description_i18n.description: The internationalized description of the field (read-only)

editable.description: Whether the field is editable by the current user

fieldName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the field (read-only)

hidden.description: Whether the field is hidden to the user user

multiple.description: Whether there can be multiple values

placeholderText.description: The help text to display in the field input (read-only)

rank.description: The rank at which the field is displayed in the document page (read-only)

readOnly.description: Whether the field is currently read-only

type.description: The field type (STRING, DATE, ..., CATEGORY, REFERENCE_CATALOG)

values.description: The values (organized as rows) contained in the table

rowId.description: Unique id of the current row

attachments.description: The list of attachments to be copied in the document to be created using this template

categories.description: The list of category fields which values (editable) will be used when creating a document using this template

classId.description: The ID of the class of the document (read-only field)

className.description: The name of the class of the document (read-only field)

className_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the class of the document (read-only field)

creationDate.description: The time at which the template was created (read-only field)

defaultTemplate.description: Whether the template is the default one for the class (read-only field)

domainName.description: The name of the domain (read-only field)

editable.description: Whether the current user can edit the template (read-only field)

fields.description: The list of native fields which values (editable) will be used when creating a document using this template

folders.description: The folder where the document will be created if no explicit folder is defined

forbiddenOperations.description: The map of the forbidden operations to the current user and the reasons why they are forbidden (read-only field)

fullSizeOfAttachments.description: The summed size (in octet) of the attachments (read-only field)

hiddenTemplate.description: Whether the template should be hidden for document creation

iconLink.description: The link to the icon relative to the attachment (read-only field)

id.description: The ID of the document template (read-only field)

initialAuthor.description: The email of the user who created the template (read-only field)

libraryId.description: The ID of the library (read-only field)

libraryName.description: The name of the library (read-only field)

modificationDate.description: The time at which the template was last modified (read-only field)

numberOfAttachments.description: The number of attachments in the template (read-only field)

permittedOperations.description: The list of permitted operations to the current user (read-only field)

referenceCatalogs.description: The list of reference catalog fields which values (editable) will be used when creating a document using this template

requiresUserInput.description: Whether this template requires user input (read-only field)

richText.description: The description field (rich text) of the document to be created using this template

sections.description: The sections in which fields are organized (read-only field)

systemFields.description: The list of system fields (only the values are editable)

tableFields.description: The list of table fields (only the values are editable)

templateName.description: The name of the document template

templateName_i18n.description: The internationalized name of the template (read-only field)

title.description: The title of the document to be created using this template (pointless in Team Folder and Secured Folder libraries)

updateAuthor.description: The email of the user who last modified the template (read-only field)

userMapping.description: The mapping between user email and user profile (read-only field)

documentTypeId_path_parameter.name: documentTypeId
documentTypeId_path_parameter.description: The ID of the document class

include_query_parameter.name: include
include_query_parameter.description: Include additional information in the document class. Available value: TEMPLATES

resetInvalidTemplateValues_query_paramet.name: resetInvalidTemplateValues
resetInvalidTemplateValues_query_paramet.description: Whether to reset the values of invalid properties in document templates of the class

templateDocumentId_path_parameter.name: templateDocumentId
templateDocumentId_path_parameter.description: The ID of the document template
